org.pimslims.business.core.service
Interface SampleService

All Superinterfaces:
BaseService, PropertyNameConvertor<SampleView>, ViewService<SampleView>
public interface SampleService
    
extends BaseService, ViewService<SampleView>



For this part I put things the way we use them, but I am sure that Anne
Pajon or anyone else in the PIMS team (or an advanced user) who know really
better than me the PIMS DB, can better organize the APIs with coherent
parameters than me. Also some of these might already be covered by the Factory
methods or beans develop within PIMS.







    
Author:

    
IMB

find


Sample find(long sampleId)
            throws BusinessException



    
Get information on a specific sample.
    

    

    

    

    

    

    

    

        
Parameters:

        
sampleId - sample reference

        
Returns:

        
information on this sample (construct, concentration, pH,
        molecular weight, nb subunits, batch, origin, type, sub cellular
        location)

        
Throws:

        
BusinessException

create

            throws BusinessException

Parameters:

        which are related to a sample (construct, concentration, pH, molecular
